body_html: Shouldn't the kind attribute of the team model be edited only by an admin when a team is selected? Currently this attribute is accessible to the team when a team is set as selected. Shall we go ahead and change this so that only an admin can access the kind attribute of a team?
body_text: Shouldn't the kind attribute of the team model be edited only by an admin when a team is selected? Currently this attribute is accessible to the team when a team is set as selected. Shall we go ahead and change this so that only an admin can access the kind attribute of a team?
body: Shouldn't the kind attribute of the team model be edited only by an admin when a team is selected? Currently this attribute is accessible to the team when a team is set as selected. Shall we go ahead and change this so that only an admin can access the kind attribute of a team?
